author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add dd4hep version of DDHGCalSiliconRotatedModule and add the v17 version full silicon layers of HE part of HGCal

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg's in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx312 Add dd4hep version of DDHGCalSiliconRotatedModule and add the v17 version full silicon layers of HE part of HGCal
